markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 3" pfs="Standard">
[Vampiric Touch](/Spells.aspx?ID=354)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Death" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=40" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
<trait label="Negative" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=118" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 380 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

**Bloodline**
[Aberrant](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=1)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** touch

**Target** 1 living creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Saving Throw** 
[basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Fortitude

</row>

</column>

---

Your touch leeches the lifeblood out of a target to empower yourself. You deal 6d6 negative damage to the target. You gain temporary Hit Points equal to half the negative damage the target takes (after applying resistances and the like). You lose any remaining temporary Hit Points after 1 minute.

---
**Heightened (+1)** The damage increases by 2d6.
name: Vampiric Touch

</summary>
summary: Deal negative damage and gain temporary HP with a touch.
summary_markdown: Deal negative damage and gain temporary HP with a touch.
text: Vampiric Touch Two Actions Source Core Rulebook pg. 380 4.0 Traditions Arcane, Divine, Occult Bloodline Aberrant Cast somatic, verbal Range touch Target 1 living creature Saving Throw basic Fortitude --- Your touch leeches the lifeblood out of a target to empower yourself. You deal 6d6 negative damage to the target. You gain temporary Hit Points equal to half the negative damage the target takes (after applying resistances and the like). You lose any remaining temporary Hit Points after 1 minute. --- Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 2d6.
